title: Never Fear
description: Detective Alex Delillo is in a state of shock. Turns out the unidentified body the cops found is that of her half-brother—one she never knew she had—and he’s the spitting image of her father. The father who walked out on his family…the same man suspected of killing three women seventeen years ago. As Alex begins to unravel her brother’s murder, her childhood comes into clearer focus. Soon she notices someone in the shadows, tracking her every move—and leaving a body count.
author: Scott Frost
